ABOUT
NUESTRA HISTORIA

THE STORY

2024

FROM CDMX TOSURREY

La Taqueria was born from a simple obsession: bringing the raw, unfiltered flavors of Mexico City street food to the heart of Woking.

Our founder grew up in the mercados of CDMX, surrounded by vendors who treated every taco like a work of art. That passion, that dedication to craft‚Äîit's in every bite we serve.

We don't do trendy. We don't do tex-mex. We do authentic, bold, unapologetic Mexican street food. Every ingredient sourced directly from Mexico. Every dish made from scratch. Every bite served with the energy of the streets.

WHAT WE STAND FOR

OUR VALUES

01

AUTHENTICITY

Real recipes passed down through generations. No shortcuts, no compromises.

02

FRESH DAILY

Every salsa, every tortilla, every marinade made fresh in-house daily.

03

BOLD FLAVORS

We don't hold back. Spice, heat, and flavor that hits different.

04

COMMUNITY

More than a taqueria. A gathering place for anyone who loves good food.
